com.epsi.edc1.library.impl

Class LibraryImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epsi.edc1.library.impl.LibraryImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Library

    public class LibraryImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Library
    This class allow us to use the implemented methods of the Library interface.
    Author:
    Alexis Dubus, Adrian Gandon

      • borrowBook

        public void borrowBook(java.lang.String id,
                       java.lang.String username)
                throws UnavailableBookException,
                       BookNotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: Library
        Borrow a book from the library
        Specified by:
        borrowBook in interface Library
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the borrowed book
        username - the name of the user
        Throws:
        UnavailableBookException - if all books in the library with the given id have been borrowed
        BookNotFoundException - if no book in the library has the given id

      • returnBook

                       java.lang.String username)
                throws BookNotFoundException,
                       AllBooksAlreadyReturnedException
        Description copied from interface: Library
        Return a book back to the library
        Specified by:
        returnBook in interface Library
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the book to borrow
        username - the name of the user
        Throws:
        BookNotFoundException - if no book in the library has the given id
        AllBooksAlreadyReturnedException - if all books with the given id are already returned
